findings.message:
Reentrancy in AStETH.burn(address,address,uint256,uint256) (AStETH.sol#1755-1773):
	External calls:
	- _burnScaled(user,amountScaled,_fetchExtData()) (AStETH.sol#1764)
		- _incentivesController.handleAction(account,oldTotalSupply,oldAccountBalance) (AStETH.sol#1458)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _totalShares = _totalShares.sub(ISTETH(UNDERLYING_ASSET_ADDRESS).getSharesByPooledEth(amountScaled).toInt256Safe()) (AStETH.sol#1765-1767)
	AStETH._totalShares (AStETH.sol#1684) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- AStETH._scaledTotalSupply(AStETH.ExtData) (AStETH.sol#2217-2223)
	- AStETH.burn(address,address,uint256,uint256) (AStETH.sol#1755-1773)
	- AStETH.mint(address,uint256,uint256) (AStETH.sol#1783-1802)
	- AStETH.mintToTreasury(uint256,uint256) (AStETH.sol#1810-1829)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

findings.message:
Reentrancy in AStETH.mint(address,uint256,uint256) (AStETH.sol#1783-1802):
	External calls:
	- _mintScaled(user,amountScaled,_fetchExtData()) (AStETH.sol#1793)
		- _incentivesController.handleAction(account,oldTotalSupply,oldAccountBalance) (AStETH.sol#1442)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _totalShares = _totalShares.add(ISTETH(UNDERLYING_ASSET_ADDRESS).getSharesByPooledEth(amountScaled).toInt256Safe()) (AStETH.sol#1794-1796)
	AStETH._totalShares (AStETH.sol#1684) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- AStETH._scaledTotalSupply(AStETH.ExtData) (AStETH.sol#2217-2223)
	- AStETH.burn(address,address,uint256,uint256) (AStETH.sol#1755-1773)
	- AStETH.mint(address,uint256,uint256) (AStETH.sol#1783-1802)
	- AStETH.mintToTreasury(uint256,uint256) (AStETH.sol#1810-1829)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

findings.message:
Reentrancy in AStETH.mintToTreasury(uint256,uint256) (AStETH.sol#1810-1829):
	External calls:
	- _mintScaled(treasury,amountScaled,_fetchExtData()) (AStETH.sol#1822)
		- _incentivesController.handleAction(account,oldTotalSupply,oldAccountBalance) (AStETH.sol#1442)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _totalShares = _totalShares.add(ISTETH(UNDERLYING_ASSET_ADDRESS).getSharesByPooledEth(amountScaled).toInt256Safe()) (AStETH.sol#1823-1825)
	AStETH._totalShares (AStETH.sol#1684) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- AStETH._scaledTotalSupply(AStETH.ExtData) (AStETH.sol#2217-2223)
	- AStETH.burn(address,address,uint256,uint256) (AStETH.sol#1755-1773)
	- AStETH.mint(address,uint256,uint256) (AStETH.sol#1783-1802)
	- AStETH.mintToTreasury(uint256,uint256) (AStETH.sol#1810-1829)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

findings.message:
Reentrancy in IncentivizedERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (AStETH.sol#1358-1371):
	External calls:
	- _transfer(sender,recipient,amount) (AStETH.sol#1363)
		- _incentivesController.handleAction(sender,currentTotalSupply,oldSenderBalance) (AStETH.sol#1423)
		- _incentivesController.handleAction(recipient,currentTotalSupply,oldRecipientBalance) (AStETH.sol#1425)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _approve(sender,_msgSender(),_allowances[sender][_msgSender()].sub(amount,ERC20: transfer amount exceeds allowance)) (AStETH.sol#1364-1368)
		- _allowances[owner][spender] = amount (AStETH.sol#1470)
findings.name: reentrancy-benign

findings.message:
Reentrancy in AStETH.mint(address,uint256,uint256) (AStETH.sol#1783-1802):
	External calls:
	- _mintScaled(user,amountScaled,_fetchExtData()) (AStETH.sol#1793)
		- _incentivesController.handleAction(account,oldTotalSupply,oldAccountBalance) (AStETH.sol#1442)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Mint(user,amount,index) (AStETH.sol#1799)
	- Transfer(address(0),user,amount) (AStETH.sol#1798)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Reentrancy in IncentivizedERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (AStETH.sol#1358-1371):
	External calls:
	- _transfer(sender,recipient,amount) (AStETH.sol#1363)
		- _incentivesController.handleAction(sender,currentTotalSupply,oldSenderBalance) (AStETH.sol#1423)
		- _incentivesController.handleAction(recipient,currentTotalSupply,oldRecipientBalance) (AStETH.sol#1425)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Approval(owner,spender,amount) (AStETH.sol#1471)
		- _approve(sender,_msgSender(),_allowances[sender][_msgSender()].sub(amount,ERC20: transfer amount exceeds allowance)) (AStETH.sol#1364-1368)
	- Transfer(sender,recipient,amount) (AStETH.sol#1369)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Reentrancy in AStETH.burn(address,address,uint256,uint256) (AStETH.sol#1755-1773):
	External calls:
	- _burnScaled(user,amountScaled,_fetchExtData()) (AStETH.sol#1764)
		- _incentivesController.handleAction(account,oldTotalSupply,oldAccountBalance) (AStETH.sol#1458)
	- IERC20(UNDERLYING_ASSET_ADDRESS).safeTransfer(receiverOfUnderlying,amount) (AStETH.sol#1769)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Burn(user,receiverOfUnderlying,amount,index) (AStETH.sol#1772)
	- Transfer(user,address(0),amount) (AStETH.sol#1771)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Reentrancy in AStETH._transfer(address,address,uint256,bool) (AStETH.sol#2013-2045):
	External calls:
	- _transferScaled(from,to,amountScaled,e) (AStETH.sol#2031)
		- _incentivesController.handleAction(sender,currentTotalSupply,oldSenderBalance) (AStETH.sol#1423)
		- _incentivesController.handleAction(recipient,currentTotalSupply,oldRecipientBalance) (AStETH.sol#1425)
	- POOL.finalizeTransfer(UNDERLYING_ASSET_ADDRESS,from,to,amount,fromBalanceScaled.rayMul(index),toBalanceScaled.rayMul(index)) (AStETH.sol#2034-2041)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- BalanceTransfer(from,to,amount,index) (AStETH.sol#2044)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Reentrancy in AStETH.transferOnLiquidation(address,address,uint256) (AStETH.sol#1838-1848):
	External calls:
	- _transfer(from,to,value,false) (AStETH.sol#1845)
		- POOL.finalizeTransfer(UNDERLYING_ASSET_ADDRESS,from,to,amount,fromBalanceScaled.rayMul(index),toBalanceScaled.rayMul(index)) (AStETH.sol#2034-2041)
		- _incentivesController.handleAction(sender,currentTotalSupply,oldSenderBalance) (AStETH.sol#1423)
		- _incentivesController.handleAction(recipient,currentTotalSupply,oldRecipientBalance) (AStETH.sol#1425)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Transfer(from,to,value) (AStETH.sol#1847)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
AStETH.permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (AStETH.sol#1979-2003) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp <= deadline,INVALID_EXPIRATION) (AStETH.sol#1990)
findings.name: timestamp
